1.content: So, what makes Megan shrink?
1.title: Beginning

11.content:
"Hi, welcome to Nanotech Labs. Do you have an appointment?" the receptionist asked.
"Megan Johnson," Megan replied, shouldering her bag. "I'm here for the nanite experiment."
"Oh, yes! Please, go right on through that door. Dr Morgan is waiting for you."
Megan headed through the door, brushing her red hair from her face. Frankly, she needed money for college, and her part-time job wasn't going to cut it. She'd seen the ad in her local paper looking for medical test subjects, and the money was pretty damn good, so she figured she'd sign up.

She found a door marked "Doctor Janice Morgan", and pushed it open.
"Ah, you must be Megan," the black woman inside greeted her warmly. "I'm Dr Morgan. You're here for the matter reduction experiment?"
"I guess," Megan replied.
"Excellent. Well, I'll have to run some preliminary tests." Dr Morgan shut the door. "Please take off all your clothes and stand over here." She gestured to a height marker on the wall, like the kind in police lineups.
Megan reddened, and Dr Morgan laughed gently. "Relax, nobody but us girls here. I'll turn my back if you like."
Megan nodded and Dr Morgan turned around while the red-haired girl undressed and stood up next to the wall.
Over the next half an hour, the doctor recorded Megan's height, weight, breast size (C, if you were wondering) and other vital statistics.
"Alright, you can get dressed now," the doctor said.
Megan pulled her clothes back on and sat up on the bed as per Dr Morgan's instructions. "Now, I'm going to inject you with some nanites, so hold still." She produced a hypodermic syringe, filled it with a yellowish fluid and injected it directly into Megan's arm.
"So what'll these do, exactly?" Megan asked.
"Basically, they're programmed to respond to a certain command word. When that word is spoken by anyone within earshot, including yourself, the nanites will activate and reduce the amount of empty space between the molecules in your body."
"What will that do?"
"Shrink you."
Seeing Megan's look of alarm, the doctor laughed. "Relax! They're programmed to only halve your size each time, the process is perfectly painless, and a second command word will immediately return you to normal size, no matter how small you are."
Megan swallowed and nodded. "What are the command words?"
"Nothing that is likely to come up in normal conversation. The failsafe command to return to normal size is 'ante-meridiem', and the command word to shrink is 'post-meridiem'."
Megan suddenly felt a tingling spread through her body, and the room seemed to get larger around her. Her shoes fell off her feet, and her clothes became a lot baggier. Within a minute, she was half her normal height- about two feet, nine inches.
"Aaaah!" she cried out in shock.
"See? No pain at all," Dr Morgan said. "Ante-meridiem."
Megan's body tingled, and she shot back up to five foot six.
"Alright! Take this journal, write about your experiences, and I'll see you in two weeks. Here's my card if you need me." She handed Megan a business card.
"Th-thankyou," she stammered, pulling her shoes back on and leaving.

Suddenly, Megan was overcome by that tingling feeling again. She began to shrink again, dwindling further from 4 foot 4 to 3 foot 4 inches tall, while standing right before her little sister!

Megan just looked up to her sister as she slowly dwindled down to 3 foot 4 inches tall. Her clothes were far too big for her. Her jeans were all wrinkled around her short, little legs. Her shirt was almost handing to the floor, and her arms were far too short for the shirt sleeves.

1522.content:
Megan had just gotten home after passing her first semester in college was enjoying her time with her parents and friends that were in town. It had been months since she last saw them and while at times she hated them for certain things, she loved them very dearly. Her younger sister Susan however...was another story.
Her sister was a very strange girl, at times she would seem like any other girl but, the girl was into strange stuff. Before she left, She caught Susan reading a book on spells and chanting over something. Her parents did try to stop such strange behavior but it would seem that they gave up after Megan left as she noticed Susan has amassed more strange books overtime. While she did try to spend time with her sister as well as her parents, the black haired twelve year old would barely say anything to her or they would just argue. Megan sighed as she straightened her long brown hair while thinking about her sister, Susan was younger she was more outgoing and social as well but that changed when she made friends with those older kids and slowly the adorable younger sister changed into a spiteful young girl.
She was really surprised however when her parents left her to watch her younger sister while they took care of their grandfather who was just recovering for surgery and needed help around the house for a few days. Megan was confused as she knew that their grandfather died several years ago when she was still a sophomore in high school. Perhaps her parents wanted a break from the antics of her younger sister? Changing into a pair of blue jeans and a white shirt, she heard her younger sister chanting in a strange language, almost sounded like her professor in her Latin classes but the language seemed off...
It was no matter though, she would only watch Susan and stay out of her way of her hobbies. heading down to the kitchen of her parents house she found a unwelcomed surprised. It would seem that her sister had made breakfast for her and her favorite at that, Eggs, bacon, toast, and a glass of orange juice. Is Susan trying to get on her good side or something? Perhaps she was still cared for her deep inside after all? With a smile, Megan took up a fork begun to eat her breakfast.
Megan heard a door opening as Susan came to the kitchen as well. Her sister seemed to have grown a little now that she noticed that she no longer had to stand o her tip toes to reach the cereal on the higher shelves. That would make her sister almost 5' coming closer to her 5 "8. Susan used to wear bright colors but now she wore a dark t-shirt with grey jeans. Sometimes she would wear other colors like red but they were all dark colors. Megan missed that sister but perhaps this one was not so bad?
"Did you make this breakfast for me?" Megan asked as her sister as sat on the other side of the family dining table.
"Yes....do you like it?" Susan replied back.
"Yes," Megan said after eating the last bite of bacon and started to work on the eggs and toast. "But why didn't you make some for yourself?"
"I'm a vegan remember? I can barely stand watching you eat that meat." As Susan began to eat her cereal.
"I...see. What were doing in your room, a curse of some kind?"
"No a good luck charm that will keep mom and dad safe on the road. Why do you think I was doing something bad?"
"I'm sorry but-"
"Fine I'll eat upstairs." without listening to Megan, Susan huffed and went back to her room, slamming her door. With a sigh, Megan finished her breakfast.
Unknowing to Megan though Susan did create a curse, a curse for a big sister in fact that made her shrink or grow....

1532.content:
The sunlight was slowly streaming along Megan Thompson's bedroom floor when her alarm clock went off, bringing her out of her peaceful slumber. She hit the Snooze button before covering her head with her pillow. Oh, how she wanted to sleep in just a little bit longer, but she had a lot to do today.

Megan got out of bed and stood up, looking at herself in her bedroom mirror. She sighed. She was still a few inches shorter than she was yesterday, thanks to her 12 year-old sister, Ashley...

****************************

Ever since Ashley was a little kid, she had the ability to control her sister's height with her mind. She could either shrink her or make her grow, though she usually chose the former. Megan usually didn't mind, as long as no one saw her shrink. Fortunately for her, however, Ashley chose to shrink her older sister inside the house, primarily so the 12 year-old could have someone to play with.

*****************************

Megan put on one of her favorite shirts, a dark blue t-shirt she had bought at Old Navy and she immediately noticed how loose it felt on her, especially around the shoulders. If she had to guess, Megan would say she was around 5'1," instead of her usual 5'5."

Megan walked downstairs and entered the kitchen. Her sister was sitting at the kitchen table, having a bowl of cereal; her mother had already left for work. The 20 year-old decided to have cereal for breakfast, too.

She went to get a bowl, noticing the cabinets were a little higher than usual, obviously due to her 4-inch reduction in height. The bowls were kept on the highest shelf, meaning Megan had to stand on the tips of her toes just to reach them. Just as she was about to get one down, however, she could feel herself shrinking again. It didn't last long; probably only 30 seconds or so. Still, Megan assumed she had shrank another 4 inches or so.

"Why did you do that?" she snapped at her younger sister, turning around as she did so. "I don't have time for this today."

Ashley smiled confidently as she stood up and walked over to Megan. Both girls noticed that they were roughly the same height.

"Because it's fun," the younger sibling replied, causing Megan to shrink another 2 inches for emphasis. "See?"

Megan readjusted her shirt, noticing that the sleeves went halfway up her arm now. She looked up at her younger sister, sighing in frustration.

"What do you want to do?" Megan asked.

"Follow me. I'll show you." The 20 year old stood her ground, shaking her head no and crossing her arms, the first time she had stood up to Ashley in a long time. Because of her defiance, Megan shrank again, now only coming up to Ashley's nose.

"What about now?" Ashley asked, smiling down at her sister.

"That depends," Megan replied. "Are you going to shrink me every time I tell you no?"

Ashley thought for a moment. "Yeah, pretty much." She held out her hand. "Shall we?"

"Fine," Megan replied bitterly, taking Ashley's hand and walking beside her much taller younger sister.

The two girls go to...

15321.content:
Ashley leads Megan into her room. Ashley goes over to her drawer and begins rifling through her clothes. Megan examines herself in Ashley's mirror. Her shirt hung low on her, like a dress. She had to be about 4' 5'' now.

"I don't know what you have in mind, but I don't think I'm fitting into any of your clothes.. unless you make me a little bigger." Megan said.

"Oh, don't worry, I'm looking for clothes that don't fit anymore." Ashley replied.

"Hey, remember when I said I had a lot to do today?" Megan said, crossing her arms.

"Come on, you do nothing but sit around all day." Ashley pulled out a T-Shirt with Unicorns all over it. She shook her head and put it back.

"I promised mom that I'd find some job applications today. She's been after me for weeks to get a job."

"Well, you can totally do that tomorrow, today I really need your help with something."

"With what?"

"You'll see..." Ashley pulls out a plain blue T-shirt and shorts. "Perfect, just like what you're wearing now."

Ashley walks over to Megan and hands her tiny big sister the clothes.

"Please help me out, sis?" Ashley gave Megan a big set of puppy dog eyes. Megan sighs and grabs the clothes from her sister.

"Fine. You want me to change into these?" Megan asked. Ashley nods, excitedly.

"Well don't look." Ashley nods and turns around.

Megan slips easily out of her over-sized clothes. She squeezes into the new outfit provided by her kid sister. Her breasts are practically popping out of the shirt, and her ass is hanging out of the shorts.

"A little tight?" Megan wheezes.

"No problem" Ashley smiles. Megan felt the clothes grow looser, and more fitting. The feeling stopped a few moments later and she found herself looking up at her kid sister who was now a head taller than her. She was just under 4 feet tall now.

"These are too big for me now!" Megan growled.

"It looks fine! Come on!" Ashley grabbed Megan's little hand and pulled her out of the room.

"Hey, where are we going!? You aren't taking me outside like this are you?" Megan squeaked.

"Who's going to recognize you? Come on!" Ashley tugged at Megan. Megan resists. "Oh come on. I promise that this will be fun!"

Megan thinks over what her sister possibly could have in store.

"I'll give you some of the money I have saved up from baby-sitting?"

Megan still seems unsure.

"And I wont shrink you again for a whole month!" Ashley added.

Megan sighed. "Fine... Just promise that whatever you have in mind, you wont embarrass me."

"Promise." Ashley crosses her fingers on her right hand. "Hmmm... looks like you could use another little spurt."

Megan dwindles another inch, leaving her at 3 foot 10.

"Perfect! Let's go, 'lil' sis!"

Megan and Ashley leave the house, and go to...

Ellen never did this to you, and ive never seen you try it on yourself."
"Ive tried on myself... It doesnt work!" She yelled back, starting yet another argument, but Megan was smart enough to walk away instead of pissing her off further.

"Just stop for now ok?" Megan said before stepping out of the room. It wasnt long before
1532312.title: Few inches bigger

15323122.content:
Ashley slowly walked to the table with Kerri and her brother. Not really caring her sister didnt join them."

"Weres uh... Melissa?" asked Kerri.
"Think she went to your room."
"Shes not gonna eat?"
"Dont think so..."

After they finished eating, Ashley and her friend went back to Kerri's room, were Kerri was hurrying to get back on their previous subject. She pointed to Megan who was sitting on her bed, "Howd you make her so small!?" Ashley thought for a moment and gave her an answer, "Like I said, me and my family have had this kind of power."
"Can you make her bigger too?"
Ashley nodded,
"Can you do it to me too!?"
"No, only to family members."
"Awh! That would be so cool though! O yeah we were playing huh!" she said, turning the subject without noticing.
"Wait, could you shrink her sister to were she was a doll!?" she excitingly continued.

Megan turned her head to Ashley, who was thinking it over...
15323122.title: Ashley stops arguing.

1533.content: So, how about Stan, a male friend of Megan's who has always had a secret crush on her? Or possibly William, an older friend of the family whom Megan has always considered an "uncle" type? Or mayble somebody else entirely?
1533.title: Someone else

15332.content: So "Uncle" William, the family friend, can slowly shrink Megan with his mind? Is he aware he has this power?
15332.title: William, the family friend

choices: Megan to stay with William for a month
William to stay with Megan for a month
153321.content:
Science is a wonderful thing, if for no other reason than its so flexible in what it defines and what it embraces.

A thousand years ago, alchemy was the realm of wizards and madmen. Now it's consider the forerunner of modern chemistry.

A hundred years ago, it was thought that gravity was instantaneous. Now we know that not only does it travel at the speed of light, but that it behaves differently on different scales and different environment.

So it should not come as a shock that there are still some things, in the small unexplored corners of the world, that would be considered impossible and akin to magic, but that perhaps a thousand years from now will be considered very common place, commercialized, categorized and...well, you get the idea.

Such was a small spell that William discovered that allowed a man to use his thoughts to shrink his subject down to a mere one-twelfth of their normal size.

Of course, the laws of conservations would say you couldn't shrink someone down to that size, or if you could, the density of their new size would make the living being quite dead. But the spell reduced the weight of said subject proportionately, without making them superdense, or super frail, or basically unable to interact with the normal sized world.

There were some limitations, however. Take a subject who was only five foot four (like Megan, for instance). William could only shrink her three inches in a day, and it would not be in one little "burst." It would take place from the rising of the sun to its setting. And, ultimately, Megan could only be shrunk down to five inches tall. So it would take quite a while for William to shrink Megan down to the ultimate goal of five inches tall, and long before he reached that goal, Megan would become aware that she was shrinking, even if it was ever so slowly.

There were other limitations too. The spell would only allow William to shrink just one subject --ever--, and said subject had to remain within five hundred feet of him when he sent his thoughts toward them. And said thoughts had to be sent forth just as the sun was rising over the horizon.

There were some other considerations, too, and the materials that William had acquired to cast the spell that gave him these powers had been almost prohibitively expensive. William would not have even tried to acquire the materials if the shaman who had taught him the spell hadn't shown him the tiny warrior he had shrunk for his own amusement.

So why did William choose Megan?

Well, William had known Megan all his life, but he had spent most of that life as a modern day explorer, occasionally dropping in to see Megan and his family. Three years had passed when he had left Megan at thirteen as a gangly, shy girl. When he had come back, he was floored. Megan at sixteen was absolutely gorgeous, and the following years had only improved her. At twenty, 5'4" Megan, with her fit and yet very femininely curved body, long dark hair falling to the small of her back, angelic face, soft brown eyes, warm smile and lightly tanned skin was definitely a head turner.

William found himself almost obsessed with the young woman who had always thought of a gangly kid for most of her life.

But Megan did not lack for suitors, and William knew that, as dashing as he might appear to a thirteen year old Megan, twenty year old Megan was more enamored with men her own age.

William knew Megan was very conservative, and hadn't done anything more than some heavy kissing and light petting above her clothes and waist. Still, William was obsessed with becoming her first lover; he just didn't know how to accomplish that goal.

Until he learned the secret of shrinking Megan.

Still, there was the problem of getting Megan in range so that he could continually shrink her for twenty days.

This problem was solved when the opportunity arose that would require
153321.title: Yes

15333.content:
Maybe Megan's 40 year old father, who has secretly had a crush on her for a few years.

With a few simple thoughts, he can control Megan's entire world.
15333.title: Megan's Daddy?

info.brief_description: You choose the method in which Megan shrinks
info.description:
In this story, I would prefer if the shrinking would progress slowly (hence the title. )

Megan is a 20 year old spending the summer with her parents before she goes back to college.

You get to choose the method in which the main character shrinks. Everything from a certain emotion (fear or anger, for example), to having another character shrink Megan using only his or her thoughts. And anything in between.

Megan has a younger sister, age 12.

Sex, profanity, whatever else, is okay to use in this story. I won't edit much, save for the occasional typo, or something like that.

Enjoy!
